name: @simzero/jsfluids
description: A high-level JS module for real-time CFD inference
author: Carlos Pena-Monferrer <carlos@simzero.com>

scripts.license-ithacafv: sed -i "1s;^;/*! For license information please see ithacafv.COPYING.LESSER */\n;" dist/ithacafv.*
scripts.license-ml: sed -i "1s;^;/*! For license information please see LICENSE */\n;" dist/ml.*
scripts.build: npm run bundle && npm run copy && npm run license-ithacafv && npm run license-ml
